Fountains are decorative scenery that can be found throughout Gielinor. Players may use various containers on them, such as buckets, vials, or waterskins in order to fill them with water. They are usually indicated on the map by a symbol.

While the vast majority of fountains have the common appearance, some towns and cities have different styled fountains. A unique golden fountain can be found in the Ratcatchers Mansion, that has an identical appearance to the Fountain of Heroes.
